title: Analysis of Systematic Science Program Effectiveness: An Inquiry for Secondary Education Application

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learners possess intermediate knowledge of educational program design and effectiveness analysis, with interest in developing science education approaches considering diverse learner needs

learning_goals: Can explain components of systematic science programs (inquiry activities, discussion structures, etc.)
Can analyze effectiveness metrics of science programs (inquiry quality, discussion level, etc.)
Can propose program improvement strategies considering diverse learner characteristics (including at-risk learners)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
